title: BEAUTIFUL NEW CONSTRUCTI0ON 3 BED#####
neighborhood: West town, East Humboldt park, Logan Square, Wicker Pral
posting_body: Your chance to live in a beautiful historic gray stone apartment building with all new construction!
-Three bedrooms all with individual closets
-In unit washer and dryer
-Elegant oak floors stained gray.
-Kitchen with island amd quartz countertops.
-5 minute walk from the beautiful Humboldt park (second largest urban park to central park)
-closer to public transportation
-One parking spot included on parking slab in the back of building
-Grocery store 2 minute walk away along with restaurants, convenience stores,and night life
-Master bed can fit king size bed with dresser
-Second largest bedroom can fit queen size bed and dresser
-Smallest room is able to fit full bed and dresser.
-The bathroom has a very spacious layout with a tub/shower, built in medicine cabinet and 36' vanity
-Central Air and heat
-Stunning gray Oak floors throughout the entire unit
-Modern style kitchen with island
-enclosed balcony serves as an area to hang out or storage
-Communal back yard.
Property manager is responsible for lawn maintenance
-Spacious high ceilings
-open floor layout is simple to decorate
-Extra large living quarters
-Unit is a large 1,500 sq.
ft. layout
-please text to initiate a phone call for further detail
